name: open-edison-connector
description: Connect to Open Edison MCP proxy servers with secure API key management
long_description: Open Edison Connector makes it easy to connect to Open Edison MCP proxy servers from Claude Desktop. Simply provide your server URL and API key, and get instant access to all your configured MCP servers and monitoring tools. Features secure credential storage and automatic connection management for single-user MCP proxying.

tools.name: mcp_status
tools.description: Get status of configured MCP servers in Open Edison

tools.name: start_mcp_server
tools.description: Start a specific MCP server by name

tools.name: stop_mcp_server
tools.description: Stop a specific MCP server by name

prompts.name: server_help
prompts.description: Get help information about using Open Edison tools
prompts.text: You are connected to the Open Edison MCP Connector. This extension provides access to your Open Edison single-user MCP proxy server and all configured MCP servers. Available tools include server status monitoring, MCP server lifecycle management, and access to your configured MCP server tools.

server_url.title: Open Edison Server URL
server_url.description: The URL of your Open Edison server's MCP API endpoint (e.g., http://localhost:3000/mcp/call)

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: Your Open Edison API key for authentication
